channel.title: Whonix Workstation terminated unexpectedly error (with VM 6.1.16 & 6.1.14)
channel.description:
Imported Whonix-XFCE-15.0.1.5.1.ova into Virtual Boc 6.1.14 (Error 1 & 2) Imported Whonix-XFCE-15.0.1.5.1.ova into Virtual Boc 6.1.16 (Error 1)
Error 1: The virtual machine 'Whonix-Workstation- XFCE' has terminated unexpectedly during startup with exit code 1 (0x1).
Result Code: NS_ERROR_FAILURE (0x80004005) Component: MachineWrap Interface: IMachine {85632c68- b5bb-4316- a900-5eb28d3413df)
Error 2: Kernel driver not installed (rc=-1908)
Make sure the kernel module has been loaded successfully.
where: suplibOslnit what: 3 VERR_VM_DRIVER_NOT_INSTALLED (-1908) - The support driver is not installed. On linux, open returned ENOENT.
-- Using MacOS Big Sur Latest Version (Uninstalled Xcode) -- System Extension Allowed & restarted before importing ova file -- Tried to restart again after those errors occurred & removed the VM's files & tried to import, but still getting the error (used virtual box latest version)

item.title: Whonix Workstation terminated unexpectedly error (with VM 6.1.16 & 6.1.14)
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
cherukumanish:

What’s the solution for Error 1 ?

My previous answer Whonix Workstation terminated unexpectedly error (with VM 6.1.16 & 6.1.14) meant to say: no VirtualBox host software support can be provided here. Whonix isn’t the creator of the VirtualBox host software. Whonix provides software for use with VirtualBox. But if VirtualBox isn’t functional, that is no up to Whonix.

cherukumanish:

How to install debian on virtual box ??

Whonix – 15 Nov 20

Please use Search Engines and see Documentation First

Please do not ask very basic questions because it will not work that way.

Read full topic
item.source: Whonix Workstation terminated unexpectedly error (with VM 6.1.16 & 6.1.14)

item.title: Whonix Workstation terminated unexpectedly error (with VM 6.1.16 & 6.1.14)
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
cherukumanish:

Kernel driver not installed (rc=-1908)

This is not an issue which could be caused by anything Whonix is doing. It’s an issue with the VirtualBox host software.

https://www.whonix.org/wiki/VirtualBox/Troubleshooting#Try_a_non-Whonix_VM

Try a non-Whonix VM

  1. “Forget” about Whonix ™ for a moment and imagine you had never heard of the platform. Test the VirtualBox host software first.
  2. Try a VM other than Whonix ™ such as for example Debian buster .
  3. If that does not solve, resolve as per Free Support Principle.

Read full topic
item.source: Whonix Workstation terminated unexpectedly error (with VM 6.1.16 & 6.1.14)

Imported Whonix-XFCE-15.0.1.5.1.ova into Virtual Boc 6.1.14 (Error 1 & 2)
Imported Whonix-XFCE-15.0.1.5.1.ova into Virtual Boc 6.1.16 (Error 1)

Error 1:
The virtual machine ‘Whonix-Workstation-
XFCE’ has terminated unexpectedly during
startup with exit code 1 (0x1).

Result Code: NS_ERROR_FAILURE
(0x80004005)
Component: MachineWrap
Interface: IMachine {85632c68-
b5bb-4316-
a900-5eb28d3413df)

Error 2:
Kernel driver not installed (rc=-1908)

Make sure the kernel module has been
loaded successfully.

where: suplibOslnit what: 3
VERR_VM_DRIVER_NOT_INSTALLED (-1908) - The support driver is not installed.
On linux, open returned ENOENT.

– Using MacOS Big Sur Latest Version (Uninstalled Xcode)
– System Extension Allowed & restarted before importing ova file
– Tried to restart again after those errors occurred & removed the VM’s files & tried to import, but still getting the error (used virtual box latest version)
